backend/main.mo: Motoko actor implementing user session and message management with blob storage mixin; provides functions for user registration, session retrieval, message addition, and a placeholder math solver endpoint.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting three Teacher Mode features in MathProblemSolver component: toggle control, pedagogical explanations, and contextual concept definitions with high confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of 14 frontend files describing the Axora AI application's components, hooks, styling, and functionality including math solver with Teacher Mode, translator, media gallery, and chat interface.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining light and dark theme color palettes using OKLCH color space, including sidebar, chart, and semantic color tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the React application with "Axora AI" title and root div mounting point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application component managing authentication via Internet Identity, rendering login screen for unauthenticated users, and providing tabbed interface with sidebar navigation for math solver, translator, and media gallery features.
frontend/src/components/ChatSidebar.tsx: Collapsible sidebar component displaying chat session list with timestamps, new chat creation button, and session selection handling with loading states.
frontend/src/components/ChatView.tsx: React component that displays a chat interface with message history, auto-scrolling, and simulated AI responses. Handles user input via textarea with Enter-to-send and formats timestamps for messages.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header component displaying the Axora AI logo, theme toggle (light/dark mode), and sign-out button for authenticated users. Uses Internet Identity for authentication state.
frontend/src/components/MathProblemSolve: Math problem solver component with grade-level selection (K-12), teacher mode toggle, and client-side expression evaluation. Generates step-by-step solutions and concept explanations for arithmetic, exponents, roots, logarithms, and trigonometry.
frontend/src/components/MediaDisplay.tsx: Tabbed media gallery component for AI-generated images and videos with prompt-based generation and file upload functionality. Includes simulated upload progress and uses custom hooks for media generation.
frontend/src/components/TranslatorChat.t: Translation chat interface supporting 12 languages with source/target language selection, translation history display, and clear history functionality. Uses custom translation hook and auto-scrolls to latest translations.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that manages the backend actor instance, creating authenticated or anonymous actors based on Internet Identity state. Automatically invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useChatSessions.ts: Custom hooks for managing chat sessions including fetching user sessions, adding messages, and creating new sessions. Handles user registration and query invalidation for real-time updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React hook and provider for Internet Identity authentication on ICP, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useMediaGeneration.ts: React hook for AI image and video generation with mock implementations that create canvas-based placeholder media with gradients and animated effects based on text prompts.
frontend/src/hooks/useTranslation.ts: React hook for text translation between languages with mock translation logic that recognizes common phrases like greetings and thanks, maintaining translation history.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining a dark/black theme with vibrant teal primary and coral accent colors, plus sidebar styling and font imports for Inter and Poppins.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility function combining clsx and tailwind-merge for conditional CSS class name merging in React components.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers, then renders the root App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending the theme with custom OKLCH color system, animations, shadows, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing Axora AI (formerly Hollow AI), an educational AI app with math solving, media generation, translation, dark theme, and chat history features spanning K-12 to college level.
